message.content:
cs.HC, cs.GR, cs.CC, cs.SI, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is the most likely category as the paper focuses on designing a VR shopping platform that supports social interactions among users. 
- cs.GR (Computer Graphics) is also likely as the paper discusses the flexible display of items in VR malls. 
- cs.CC (Computational Complexity) is relevant as the paper proves the NP-hardness of the problem. 
- cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) is relevant as the paper considers social interactions among users in VR group shopping. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is relevant as the paper involves designing a VR shopping platform that supports the display of multimedia content.
